definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: Is Federer at least safe at No. 2?
sentences.chinese: 費德勒至少是穩獲年終第二了吧？

sentences.english: This is also Murai this season second time defeats Feidler.
sentences.chinese: 這也是穆雷本賽季第二次擊敗費德勒。

sentences.english: Federer is the French Open champion at last after beating Robin Soderling in straight sets at Roland Garros.
sentences.chinese: 費德勒直落三盤擊敗索德林，最終問鼎法網冠軍。

sentences.english: Why should papa Federer have all the fun?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼當爸爸會使費德勒有這麼大樂趣？

sentences.english: "Novak was the player of the year, which goes without saying," reflected Federer.
sentences.chinese: “諾瓦克是今年的最佳選手，毫無疑問，”費德勒說。

sentences.english: Tomas Berdych celebrates after beating Roger Federer in the quarterfinals June 30.
sentences.chinese: 伯蒂奇慶祝在四分之一決賽中擊敗費德勒6月30日。

sentences.english: The adverse decision means Fidler's roof must come down.
sentences.chinese: 這一判決意味着費德勒必須拆除他的城堡。

sentences.english: Roger Federer of Switzerland has won the French Open Tennis Championship for the first time in his career.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士選手費德勒獲得其職業生涯中首次法網公開賽。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Federer said he was enjoying the building excitement.
sentences.chinese: 費德勒還稱他現在很享受這種慢慢積累的興奮感。

sentences.english: Federer and Mirka, both tennis players, announced in March this year that they were expecting their first child.
sentences.chinese: 費德勒夫婦都是網球運動員，於今年4月在瑞士完婚。

sentences.english: Federer's adductor flexibility accounts for a lot of his 'talent'.
sentences.chinese: 費德勒的內收肌的良好靈活性更過的歸功於他的天賦。
